common.description: This is a simple dashboard application with authentication using Next.js, NextAuth, and Prisma.
common.404-desc: Sorry, the page you requested does not exist.
common.password-limit: Password must be at least 6 characters
common.profile-desc: This is a protected page only visible to authenticated users.
common.public-desc: This is a public page that anyone can access, even if they’re not logged in.
common.public-final-desc: Try navigating to the profile page — you’ll be redirected to login if not authenticated.
common.name-limit: Name must be at least 2 characters
